name: Dice Defiance
description:
The aim of the game is simple: defeat the boss and stay alive Each try, you'll recieve a party of random dice with random sizes. On the world map you'll see your progression to your end goal 

Combat is turn-based, and each turn is automatically resolved. Your party will attack first. Then the enemy strikes back. Before each turn, you can swap 2 adjacent characters.

Each dice has it's HP and ATK stat. When a dice attacks, it deals damage equal to it's ATK to the enemy. Each dice has it's own unique ability that influences combat. The dice roll determines the impact of the ability
